dublin_core.dcvalue: PIERS works to prevent deadly complications of pre-eclampsia using a mobile phone predictive model system that can accurately stratify women into risk categories up to one week before complications arise. CHWs can use the system to provide referrals and treatment advice for pre-eclampsia and transmit information to referral centers for coordination of triage, transportation and treatment.
